'~ 
ASME BPVC.II.A-2025 
Table 11-200-1 
Ferrous Material Specifications Acceptable for BPVC Construction {Including Acceptable ASTM 
Editions) (Cont'd) 
Latest 
ASME Material Adopted All Acceptable Editions 
Specification [Note (1)] Description [Note (2)] [Note (3)], [Note ( 4)] 
SA-209/SA-209M 03(2017) Identical 88 through 03(2017) 
SA-210/SA-210M 19 Identical 96 through 19 
SA-213/SA-213M 23 Identical except for the additional H Grade heat treatment requirements in 10 through 23 
para. 6.2 and Supplementary Requirement SS made mandatory. For Grade 
T91 Type 1, other acceptable editions are limited to 18 and later. For Grade 
T91 Type 2, the acceptable edition is limited to 23 with Supplementary 
Requirement S5 made mandatory. For UNS S31035 and UNS K91060, other 
acceptable editions are limited to 18b and later. For UNS S31050, other 
acceptable ASTM editions are limited to 15a and later. For UNS S31002, 
other ASTM editions are limited to 22 and later. 
SA-214/SA-214M 19 Identical 88 through 19 
SA-216/SA-216M 21 Identical except for addition of 2.3 and editorial differences in 2.1 and 10.1 12 through 21 
SA-217 /SA-217M 22 Identical except for addition of 2.3 and editorial differences in 2.1 and 9.1. 12 through 22 
SA-225/SA-225M 17 Identical 86 through 17 
SA-231/SA-231M 96 Identical except that certification requirements in 13.1 are mandatory 
SA-232/SA-232M 91 Identical 
SA-234/SA-234M 23a Identical, except for editorial correction of Supplementary Requirement S5. For 82a through 23a 
Grade WP91, other acceptable ASTM editions are limited to 18 and later. For 
welded and filler metal products ordered to Section III or Section VIII, 
Division 1, Supplementary Requirement S4 is mandatory. For Grade WP91 
Type 2, Supplementary Requirement S5 is mandatory. 
SA-240/SA-240M 17 Identical except for UNS S31050, other acceptable ASTM editions are limited to 88c through 17 
04 and later. For UNS S32906, other acceptable ASTM editions are limited to 
07e1 and later. For UNS S38815, other acceptable ASTM editions are limited 
to 16 and later. For UNS S32101, other acceptable ASTM editions are limited 
to -OS and later. 
SA-249/SA-249M 18a Identical except for the deletion of S5, which allows lower mechanical 88b through 18a 
properties, and for Section I only, S9 is mandatory when 100% joint 
efficiency is required. For UNS S31040, other acceptable ASTM editions are 
limited to 10a and later. For UNS S31254, other acceptable ASTM editions 
are limited to 01 and later. 
SA-250/SA-250M 05(2014) Identical except that Supplementary Requirement Sl is mandatory when 100% 88a through 05(2014) 
weld joint efficiency is required. 
SA-263 12(2019) Identical. In cases where cladding is used in the design strength calculations 88 through 12(2019) 
and welding is used to join multiple alloy cladding plates, ASTM editions 
prior to 12 are not acceptable unless welding was performed by an ASME 
Certificate Holder. 
SA-264 12(2019) Identical. In cases where cladding is used in the design strength calculations 88 through 12(2019) 
and welding is used to join multiple alloy cladding plates, ASTM editions 
prior to 12 are not acceptable unless welding was performed by an ASME 
Certificate Holder. 
SA-265 12(2019) Identical. In cases where cladding is used in the design strength calculations 88 through 12(2019) 
and welding is used to join multiple alloy cladding plates, ASTM editions 
prior to 12 are not acceptable unless welding was performed by an ASME 
Certificate Holder. 
SA-266/SA-266M 21 Identical. ASTM editions 03 through 11 are acceptable provided the term 99 through 21 
"hubbed flanges" is replaced with "hubbed flat heads" in oara. 3.4. 
1613
